GPIO_PINS.__comment: gpic = GPIO pin to take a picture / gvid = GPIO pin to take a video / gpir = GPIO pin of the PIR sensor

GPIO_DEFAULT_INPUT_STATE.__comment: default state of the GPIO pins. The buttons are on High when inactive and the PIR is low when inactive

SIZE_DEFINITIONS.__comment: Defines the size of the TFT display attached, the picture and video size and also how long a video should but plus how many pictures to take in a row

EVENT_WAIT_TIME.__comment: how long to wait after taking photos and the like

RUN_MODE.__comment: If you want to use the picbrick as a home surveillance system, set this to True and the camera will take pictures and videos, if the motion detector detects movement
